doc.title: Jackpot Do Karode
doc.plot: Rana (Pankaj Kapoor) is a middle class mill-worker, with a criminal past. He has a son, who is seriously ill. In order to get treatment, he must take him abroad to America, and for this he must have money. So he agrees to take up a final criminal assignment, which is to kidnap a wealthy politician's only daughter, Sonu Datta (Supriya Pathak). Rana has arranged for several pawns to do his dirty work for him, who are Vishal (Girija Shanker), a professional and wealthy painter by profession, his wife Pooja (Beena), and a number of others. Vishal is to meet with Mrs. Datta and get the ransom amount, he is then to sell her his paintings, get a bank draft for a large amount, which he is to cash and then report to the police that the large cash amount has been stolen. But Murphy's law steps in and chaos breaks out.
